Dracon smiles and gives them the go. He sits back in a tech chair.

"Let's =
 do it!" he shouts positively.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Jeff=
 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, June 28, 2003 4:26 PM
  S=
ubject: Re: StarDrill Inc.


  ooc: oops, missed rukus' name in the post ><=


  also, note to all - the predacons and the maximals will probably 
  not=
ice this light show, since the station is fairly big. as soon as 
  they fi=
nd out what these guys are doing, they'll be quite unhappy 
  with them =3D=
p

  --Rukus--

  "Done." The black and white bot says as he plots the orbi=
al path of 
  the station to match the place on earth where Dracon's energy=
 link 
  was. "We're ready to begin transporting materials down to the 
  s=
urface."


  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrot=
e:
  > Krhinos: If you mean you're actually better at processing the ore
  =
> rather than mining it out, that's fine by me. Anyways, that drill 
  we
 =
 > brought with us is specially made to fit on one of my multi-purpose
  > =
pod. Just engage that energy link so we can travel back and forth.
  > Ruku=
s, set us on orbit right over the link once Dracon engages it.
  > We'll be=
 good to go right after that.
  > 



        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
      =
 
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Se=
rvice.
